R01.rule_text: There should be a single type of service as an entry point.

R02.rule_text: All entry points should have a circuit breaker.

R03.rule_text: All entry points should have a load balancer.

R04.rule_text: All entry points should perform authorization.

R05.rule_text: All entry points should perform authentication.

R06.rule_text: All connections between services should be authorized.

R07.rule_text: All connections between services should be authenticated.

R08.rule_text: There should be a single type of authorization service.

R09.rule_text: R09 & There should be a single type of authentication service. \

R10.rule_text: No service that performs authorization should perform any other business functionality.

R11.rule_text: No service that performs authentication should perform any other business functionality.

R12.rule_text: There should be a service limiting the number of login attempts.

R13.rule_text: All connections between a service and an external entity should be encrypted.

R14.rule_text: All connections between two services should be encrypted.

R16.rule_text: There should be a single type of central logging subsystem.

R17.rule_text: There should be a message broker.

R18.rule_text: All services that perform logging should be connected to a message broker.

R19.rule_text: No service that performs logging should be connected to a central logging subsystem.

R20.rule_text: There should be a monitoring dashboard.

R21.rule_text: All services should be connected to a monitoring dashboard.

R23.rule_text: There should be a single type of service registry.

R24.rule_text: All service registries should have validation checks for incoming requests.

R25.rule_text: There should be a single type of central secret store.
